Protected Instance methods

each_angle(radius_formula)

[Source]

    # File slices/google_maps/google/marker_shapes.rb, line 26
26:       def each_angle(radius_formula)
27:         self << "{
28:           angle = 0;
29:           i = 1;
30:           while (angle < 360){
31:             radius = #{radius_formula}
32:             x = radius * Math.cos(angle);
33:             y = radius * Math.sin(angle);  
34:         "
35: 
36:         marker = Google::Marker.new(:location => {:latitude => 'location.lat() + y', :longitude => 'location.lng() + x'},
37:                                     :icon => :blue_circle)
38:         self << "map.addOverlay(marker);"
39:         
40:         self << "  
41:             i = i + 1;
42:             angle += 5;
43:           }
44:          }
45:         "        
46:       end

[Validate]
